body.name: Baby Bed Crib Screws and Bolts Hardware Kit 16mm 20mm 30mm 40mm 45mm 50mm 55mm 70mm 75mm 85mm Bolts Barrel Nuts for Furniture Bunk Cot Crib Bed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 55 mins
features: This baby bed crib screws bolts hardware kit includes M6 x 16mm 20mm 30mm 40mm 45mm 50mm 55mm 70mm 75mm 85mm bolts (exclusive of head), barrel nut (D: 9.8mm x L:11mm 12.5mm 14.5mm) and one hex key.

This is an economical replacement for your missing M6 baby crib bolts. If you just lost 1 or 2 bolts or nuts, this kit is a good value for your choice. < If you need more bolts and nuts, visit our store to buy>.
10 sizes bolts and 3 sizes barrel nuts, this bolts nuts hardware kit fits most cribs, beds, tables, chairs, or workbenches, DIY projects, etc.
Crib screws bolts and barrel nuts are made of carbon steel, they are solid hardware replacements for most cribs, beds, Cot, Bunk, tables, chairs, or workbenches, DIY projects, furniture, etc.

IMPORTANT: Please measure the size of the holes that the bolts fit in before purchase, bolts in this kit are M6 threads. Please check the lengths of the bolts you will need and confirm the size you will need to ensure you are ordering the proper size bolt and nuts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: M6 Bolts and Nuts Hardware Kit for Baby Crib Bed Cot Bunk Furniture Assembly If you just lost 1 or 2 bolts or nuts of your baby crib, this is an economical replacement for your missing ones.Note: This Hardware Kit works for Most Cribs But Not for All Cribs, Please Check Your Crib Parts List to See If This Kit will Work....

M6 Bolts: M6*16mm ---3 PCS, M6*20mm ---3 PCS, M6*30mm ---3 PCS, M6*40mm ---3 PCS, M6*45mm ---3 PCS, M6*50mm ---3 PCS, M6*55mm ---3 PCS, M6*70mm ---3 PCS, M6*75mm ---3 PCS, M6*85mm ---3 PCS, M6 Barrel Nuts: 9.8x11.5mm ---10 PCS 9.8x12.5mm ---10 PCS 9.8x14.5mm ---10 PCS

Please measure the size of the holes that the bolts fit in before purchase.Bolts in this kit are M6 threads. Please check the lengths of the bolts you will need and confirm the size you will need to ensure you are ordering the proper size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Target crib.
reviews.reviewText: Worked great. I couldn't find the hardware to out crib from out first baby, and these fit perfect. We got our crib from target. The standard Grey one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for our used Pottery Barn crib
reviews.reviewText: We got a used crib from a family who had bought it from Pottery Barn. When we went to pick it up, the dad said that when he tried to get the crib apart, some of the screws stripped out. My husband had some trouble finding replacements at the hardware store. These were not all the exact lengths we needed but they came very close so we bought them. They worked well and the crib went up quickly. We imagine we will also need to use this kit when we convert the crib into the toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This product was extremely helpful after we bought a used crib that was missing some hardware.Every piece we needed fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: We were missing parts (obviously since we purchased this) for a baby crib and this kit hatd everything that we needed to get the crib together. The kit did not include washers, which wasnt a big deal for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good replacement screws
reviews.reviewText: Replaced previous bolts which heads had stripped on many of them. Worked perfectly. Glad to have the correct Allen wrench as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect kit to have if you have kids.
reviews.reviewText: Lot of bolts for good price. Can't find these in stores easily and after 2 kids that are 5 years apart we lost 2. These were almost exact replacemt for the crib

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Uneven amount of each size
reviews.reviewText: The reason for the low stars there was a good value good packaging came timely but the problem was is there was three of one size six of another and five of the other. They were just not even amounts of screws to barrel nuts either
